info.title: Problemologist Worker API (Light)
info.description: Sandboxed execution and filesystem API for agentic CAD tasks

post.description: Inspect topological features of the component.
List contents of a directory.

schema.title: Response List Files Fs Ls Post

post.description: Check if a file or directory exists.
Read file contents.
Write content to a file.
Edit a file with one or more operations.
Upload a file with binary content.
Read file contents as binary blob.
Search for a pattern in files.

schema.title: Response Api Grep Fs Grep Post

post.description: Bundle the session workspace into a gzipped tarball.
Delete a file or directory.
Initialize a git repository in the workspace.
Commit changes to the local repository.
Resolve a merge conflict.
Abort a merge.
Complete a merge.
Execute Python code in session-isolated environment.
Lint Python code using ruff.
Run multi-seed verification with runtime jitter.
Physics-backed stability check in isolated session.
Geometric validity check in isolated session.
Run SPICE validation on the provided electronics section.
Component analysis (topology, material, weight) in isolated session.
Render a preview of the CAD design from specified camera angles.
Rebuild simulation assets (GLB) from source without running full simulation.
Handover to reviewer in isolated session (moved to heavy due to DFM dependencies).
